Title: Ragtime
Writer: E.L. Doctorow (based on the novel by), Michael Weller (screenplay)
Actors: James Cagney, Brad Dourif, Moses Gunn, Elizabeth McGovern
Plot: A young black pianist becomes embroiled in the lives of an upper-class white family set among the racial tensions, infidelity, violence, and other nostalgic events in early 1900s New York City.
Awards: Nominated for 8 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 13 nominations.
